scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run test:all
scripts.build:base: npm run lint:base && npm run test:base
scripts.build:cc: npm run lint:cc && npm run test:cc
scripts.build:pc: npm run lint:pc && npm run test:pc
scripts.test:all: npm run test:base && npm run test:cc && npm run test:pc
scripts.prepub:base: npm run build:base && npm run license:base && npm run version:base
scripts.prepub:cc: npm run build:cc && npm run license:cc && npm run version:cc
scripts.prepub:pc: npm run build:pc && npm run license:pc && npm run version:pc
scripts.prepub:all: npm run prepub:base && npm run prepub:cc && npm run prepub:pc
scripts.publish:base: npm run prepub:base && cd base && npm publish
scripts.publish:cc: npm run prepub:cc && cd complete-coverage && npm publish
scripts.publish:pc: npm run prepub:pc && cd partial-coverage && npm publish
scripts.publish:all: npm run publish:base && npm run publish:cc && npm run publish:pc
